headline: Renaissance Loads Up on Netflix, Lam Research, ServiceNow — Smart Money Signals Shift
summary: Hedge fund giant Renaissance Group just made some aggressive portfolio moves — and the message is clear: streaming, AI infrastructure and enterprise software are where the smart money is leaning. Its latest 13F filing shows massive position increases in Netflix Inc (NASDAQ:NFLX), Lam Research Corp (NASDAQ:LRCX) and ServiceNow Inc (NYSE:NOW), alongside a wave of fresh bets across healthcare, mining and financials. headline: ASML Climbs 11% in a Month: Time to Buy, Sell or Hold the Stock?
summary: ASML Holding jumps 11% in a month as AI-driven EUV demand, a EUR 38.8B backlog and rising 2026 estimates fuel bullish momentum despite valuation concerns.

headline: Applied Materials Stock Rises. It’s Another Winner from the Memory-Chip Boom.
summary: Applied Materials stock soared as it became the latest chipmaking equipment company to flag a rise in demand for its services.

headline: Applied Materials jumps as AI demand drives chipmaking tool orders
summary: Feb 13 (Reuters) - Applied Materials' (AMAT) shares jumped 11.7% in premarket trading on Friday as investors bet that surging AI demand and ‌a tightening memory market will continue to drive orders for the ‌company's chipmaking tools, after it forecast second-quarter revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates.
